description: This file defines the NotesProvider class in Dart, which manages state and business logic for a notes application. It interacts with a database (NotesDatabase) and a Note model to perform operations like initializing data, querying, adding, updating, and deleting notes. It uses ChangeNotifier for state management and notifies listeners of changes.

classes.name: NotesProvider
classes.description: A class that manages notes state, interacts with the notes database, and notifies listeners of any changes. It provides methods for initializing data, filtering notes by query and category, and CRUD operations for notes.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the provider by setting up the database connection and fetching initial notes and categories.

methods.name: _refreshNotesAndCategories
methods.description: Internal method to refresh the list of notes and categories from the database.

methods.name: setQuery
methods.description: Sets the search query and updates the notes list accordingly.

methods.name: setCategory
methods.description: Sets the active category filter and updates the notes list.

methods.name: addNote
methods.description: Creates and inserts a new note into the database, then refreshes the local data.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note with new details.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note by its ID from the database.
